sentences.en: 'It probably shows up a deeply immature part of my psyche,' he confesses.
sentences.cn: “它可能表现了我内心很不成熟的一面，”他承认道。

sentences.en: "It probably shows up a deeply immature part of my psyche," he confesses.
sentences.cn: “它可能表现了我内心很不成熟的一面，”他承认道。

sentences.en: Because of the immunity of the immature insects, it'simportant to spray regularly.
sentences.cn: 由于幼虫对药物有免疫力，因此必须经常喷药。

sentences.en: God, we're so innocent and immature compared to her. "
sentences.cn: 天哪, 我们跟她相比多么天真,多么不成熟. ”

sentences.en: He forgave his son’s immature behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他原谅了儿子的幼稚行为。

sentences.en: He implied that we were emotionally immature.
sentences.cn: 他暗示我们情感上还不成熟。

sentences.en: He was a young lad, very green, very immature.
sentences.cn: 他还是个毛头小子，幼稚得很，一点都不成熟。

sentences.en: His speech is immature, his vocabulary limited.
sentences.cn: 他说话很幼稚，使用的词汇有限。

sentences.en: Lord Kierton's going to say I'm being immature again.
sentences.cn: 基尔顿勋爵又要说我不成熟了.

sentences.en: Rudolf offered tobacco, feeling suddenly immature as he did so.
sentences.cn: 鲁道夫递过烟来, 但又马上觉得这样做有些不够妥当.

sentences.en: She's just being childish and immature.
sentences.cn: 她在耍小孩子脾气，真是任性。

sentences.en: The birds were in immature plumage.
The immature neutrophil has a nonsegmented nucleus in shape of a horseshoe.
sentences.cn: 很幼稚的嗜中性粒细胞的核呈马蹄形,不分叶.

sentences.en: Tony seemed very shallow and immature.
sentences.cn: 托尼看起来好像很肤浅,不夠成熟.

words.tran_cn: 未成熟；粗糙；未臻完美；不完全

trans.tran_cn: 不成熟的，未完成的，粗糙的，幼小
